title: Awful
review: It was terrible a lot of noise and dirty it was like a scrapyard don't come they charge you £10 for cleaning per day and breakfast was shocking my son got sick because of it  I recommend you don't com here

title: AWFUL!
review: this is definitely not true, but we do not accept you to make unfair comments

title: Clean and good location
review: Horrible and really dirty rooms. It felt like being in a cellar. We had to change hotel for the dirt and for the noise. Only positive note the decent (but not exceptional) location. Stay away from this hotel.

title: Good Place to stay
review: They have nice place to stay. Its clean and staying nearby everywhere. So you dont miss ur time to do things.  Price of room is good also reception and staff of hotel is they look after u so well. They just need to make good quality of breakfast

title: Safe place in the jungle
review: So comfortable and clean place to have sleep and spend time. The staff and location of hotel excellent for everything. Absoluletly Cavit so helpfull to do everything for everyone. I highly prefer to everyone to stay..

title: Good Servıces
review: Hello everyone. I would lıke to tell you thatş Ista palace ıs a very frıendly place and wıth hıgh qualıty of servıces..ın the mornıng you can a have very ınterestıng breakfast wıth a nıce and good waıters... you can enjoy more from your stayıng at Ista Palace.... by the way Ista Palace ıs very safe for famılıy people too.... you can trust all of the member staff.....  Hope you enjoy from your halıday.  all the best.... Seyed

title: Very nice place
review: Nice place, clean rooms and good service. We stayed there for a week. The staff was helpfull and nice. We had a few problems with the room first day but we got another room and everything was okay. The breakfast bufet was okay. I could be more varied though. In general a very nice place and worth the money.

title: Good Servıces
review: I lıve ın thıs hotel for 6days and 5nıghts, that was really good. the servıces here really good. ;) enjoy my day ın Istanbul. you wıll never regret. try thıs hotel!
